[Page Title: Drinks – Minero Restaurant Johns Island]

MENU 
JOHNS ISLAND, SC 29455
 (843) 278-8998
3140 MAYBANK HIGHWAY 
THE DRINKS

Centrally focused on agave spirits, the drinks program features a margarita-dominant cocktail list and other classic and well-known agave-based cocktails. Tequila and mezcal offerings fill the spirits list with various styles, ages, and regions represented. From the Blue Weber agave fields in the Highlands of Jalisco to the Espadin fields in Oaxaca, a casual or expert drinker will feel at home cozying up to the bar. Celebrated cervezas, craft beers, canned wines, non-alcoholic cocktails, Mexican sodas, and authentic refreshments help balance the drink offerings.
DRINKS MENU AGAVE SPIRITS MENU
